source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_00<tab>As great a fisher of men as he is a devourer of fish, Guildmaster Wawalago reels you in with a choice challenge.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_00<tab>漁師ギルドのワワラゴは、冒険者に頼み事があるようだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_01<tab>Wawalago certainly has a way with words, though which way that is, not even the Navigator can say. Console yourself by catching the living legends sighted in La Noscea, the Black Shroud, and Thanalan, and present them to Wawalago at Fisherman's Bottom on the lower decks of Limsa Lominsa.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_01<tab>ワワラゴから依頼を受けた。「ラノシア」「黒衣森」「ザナラーン」で目撃されている「オオヌシ」を釣り上げ、リムサ・ロミンサの漁師ギルド前にいる「ワワラゴ」に納品しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_02<tab>You have delivered the living legends to Wawalago. Even as the guildmaster heaps praise upon you, a puller arrives with alarming news that the ordinarily fertile Rhotano Sea has ceased to yield its bounty. Wawalago suspects that the currents may be to blame, and pledges to have Sisipu look into the matter. Meanwhile, he urges you to continue your hunt for living legends. Make your way to Coerthas and Mor Dhona, and deliver the creatures you capture to Wawalago.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_02<tab>ワワラゴに、各地の「オオヌシ」を納品した。環境の変化にともない、まだ魚影の報告のない地域にも「オオヌシ」が出現しているかもしれない。「クルザス」と「モードゥナ」でも「オオヌシ」を釣り上げ、漁師ギルド前にいる「ワワラゴ」に納品しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_03<tab>Too many legends spoil everything, according to Ascelyn. The scholar arrives with news that the fisheries along the Rhotano seaboard face extinction unless the Nepto Dragon is removed from circulation. Like many monsters, it currently resides in Costa del Sol. Go there and speak with the steersman.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_03<tab>ワワラゴに、さらなる「オオヌシ」を納品した。どうやら「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の出現が、ロータノ海の環境に影響を与えているようだ。ロータノ海の生物を守るためには、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣り上げなければならない。「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」が目撃された東ラノシアのコスタ・デル・ソルに向かい、「大型船の船員」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_04<tab>You come to a quick understanding with the steersman. His boat will take you to the Rhotano privateer, where your destiny awaits in the form of a giant fish. If you should catch this Nepto Dragon, the saltworn captain is keen to take a measure of the fish...and you.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_04<tab>大型船の船員と話した。洋上の大型船に向かい、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣り上げよう。釣り上げた「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」は、洋上の大型船に乗っている「腕利きの船長」に渡そう。洋上の大型船へは、コスタ・デル・ソルの船頭が連れていってくれるそうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_05<tab>You have killed a legend to save the local economy; such is the trade-off in these calamitous times. Your erstwhile opponent now lies limply on deck, awaiting Ascelyn's delicate knives. It occurs to you that Wawalago may share your sense of loss, and so seek him out him you shall.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_05<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を納品した。アセリンはロータノ海の環境保全のために、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の研究を進めるようだ。漁師ギルドへ戻り、「ワワラゴ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_06<tab>Wawalago's sense of loss has less to do with mystique and more to do with meunière. However, his regard for you is sincere and robust, and a day of hard fishing has left you famished. Not all legends endure, but they sure are tasty, especially when paired with a chilled lowland white.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SEQ_06<tab>ワワラゴは、名実共にエオルゼアいちの漁師となった冒険者を祝福した。しかし、釣りから学ぶことは、まだまだありそうだ。これからもエオルゼアの海や河を渡り歩き、漁師としての腕を磨いていこう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_00<tab>Deliver living legends fished in La Noscea, the Black Shroud, and Thanalan to Wawalago.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_00<tab>ワワラゴにラノシアと黒衣森とザナラーンで釣ったオオヌシを渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_01<tab>Deliver living legends fished in Coerthas and Mor Dhona to Wawalago.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_01<tab>ワワラゴにクルザスとモードゥナで釣ったオオヌシを渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the steersman at Costa del Sol.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_02<tab>コスタ・デル・ソルの大型船の船員と話す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_03<tab>Catch the Nepto Dragon from the privateer, and deliver it to the saltworn captain.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_03<tab>洋上の大型船で<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>を釣って、腕利きの船長に渡す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Wawalago at Fisherman's Bottom.
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_TODO_04<tab>漁師ギルド前のワワラゴと話す

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_100_000<tab>The arrival of an audacious adventurer is always an auspicious affair! I've a word for you if you would wait but a whit, whew!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_100_000<tab>冒険者クン、ちょうどよかった。
チミに伝えたいことがあったのぢや。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_000<tab>All this long while have I, Wawalago, wielded the willow, and so I've an unparalleled understanding of the Calamity's copious consequences for creatures that cavort in courses and combers.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_000<tab>ワシも長いこと、漁師として竿を振ってきたが、
霊災が起きてから、ずいぶんと海や河の様子も変わった……。
お魚さんも、環境に合わせて生息地を変化させたのぢやろう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_001<tab>Such confusion and chaos caused by the Calamity! Fish are found far from where they once frolicked. Like the loosing of the legendary Nepto Dragon in new domiciles...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_001<tab>チミが以前釣り上げた「ヌシ」の一部……
そして、伝説の巨大魚「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」も、
そうした時々の環境の変異により現れたのかもしれんのう。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_002<tab>With which I wander onto today's topic: the realm rings with reports and rumors of fantastic fish, incredible ichthyic impressions that indicate an onslaught of Old Ones!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_002<tab>そして、ここからが本題ぢや……
最近になって、未知の魚影を見たという噂が出ているんぢやよ！
もしかしたら、まだ見ぬ大物かもしれん！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_003<tab>Better than Old Ones─living legends!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_003<tab>そう、すなわち「ヌシ」の中の「ヌシ」……。
名づけて「オオヌシ」ぢや！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_004<tab>Only a false fisher fails to fling <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> at such a fortuitous find!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_004<tab>そんな魚がおるのなら、釣り上げてみたいと思うのが、
漁師としての本能ぢやろう？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_006<tab>La Noscea, the Black Shroud, and Thanalan were where these rousing reports arose. The dearth of details does deter dilettantes, despite the delights of living legends!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_006<tab>「オオヌシ」と思われる魚影が目撃されたのは、
「ラノシア」と「黒衣森」、それに「ザナラーン」……。
ぢやが、細かな生息地や、具体的な条件まではわかっておらん。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_007<tab>But you're a fully fledged fisher, flush with frills and fundamentals both! Lure all three living legends into the light of day, or die despairing!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_007<tab>冒険者クンも、今や一人前の漁師。
これまで培ってきた知識と技量、漁師としての経験を活かし、
それぞれの地で、未知の大物……「オオヌシ」を仕留めるのぢや！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_008<tab>Enervated by the enormity of the enterprise? Practice makes perfect, so you might ply your pole against all the Old Ones first.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_008<tab>自信が無いなら、まずは各地の「ヌシ」を全て釣り上げるのぢや。
その頃には、チミは「オオヌシ」に挑戦できるだけの、
腕前を得ていることぢやろうて。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_012<tab>If only I were footloose and fancy-free like you! It is my fatal flaw that I am indisposed as well as too important to indulge my instinct for ichthyic inspection.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_012<tab>ワシも漁師の本能がプルプル疼くのぢやが……
立場と年齢が、自由な釣りの旅を許さんからのう。
ここは、ワシの次に腕の立つ、チミに浪漫を託すぞい！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_005<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_005<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_009<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_009<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_010<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_010<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_011<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_011<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_030<tab>Have you landed those three living legends? If first you fail, try tirelessly to much avail!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_030<tab>「ラノシア」、「黒衣森」、「ザナラーン」……。
それぞれの地で、噂の「オオヌシ」は釣れたかのう？
流石に、今回は無理かもしれんなあ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_031<tab>Feel these firm flanks, see how the scales scintillate! This is some show of skill, that you learned to lure these living legends!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_031<tab>この立派な魚体……鱗の美しさ……。
まさしく「オオヌシ」と呼ぶにふさわしい！
これを釣り上げるとは……まったく、大したもんぢやわい！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_032<tab>Master Wawalago, don't mean to bother ye, but I need a moment of yer time.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_032<tab>なあ、ワワラゴ親分。
ちょっといいかい、相談があるんだ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_033<tab>These days, it's almost like the Rhotano's fished out. Everybody sits as high comin' back as they did goin' out.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_033<tab>ここ数日、ロータノ海の魚が、急に網にかからなくなってきてな。
水揚げ量が、かなり減少している……。
何か、打つ手はないもんだろうか。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_034<tab>Fewer fish, you say? A dire development that disrupts dining delights for decades!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_034<tab>ふーむ……。
減少が続くようぢやと、深刻な問題に発展してしまうのう……。
わかった、すぐにシシプちゃんに調べさせよう！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_035<tab>Aye, this ain't yer average bad streak. Somethin's happened out there, and folks are tired of watchin' and waitin'.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_FISHERMAN_000_035<tab>ああ、頼んだぜ……。
このままじゃあ、俺たちは、おまんまの食い上げだ。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_036<tab>This time of the year, there ought to be colossal catches of cod and cuttlefish, croakers and capelin!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_036<tab>この時期に水揚げ量が減るなんぞ、考えられんことぢやが……。
……もしや、環境に変化が起きておるのぢやろうか。
となると……新たな「オオヌシ」が？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_037<tab>Could it be the consequence of crazy currents displacing denizens of the drink? I shall set Sisipu on this situation straightaway!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_037<tab>「クルザス」と「モードゥナ」からは、
まだ未知の魚影を見たという話は入っておらんが、
これは、わからなくなってきたぞい！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_039<tab>Meanwhile, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, why don't you resume reeling for living legends? Reports have recently reached me of sightings in Coerthas and Mor Dhona. Return hither once you have hooked and hauled in those hulks!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_039<tab>水揚げ量のことはシシプちゃ……いや、ワシに任せればよい！
チミは「クルザス」と「モードゥナ」で、
新たな「オオヌシ」を探し当てるのぢや！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_038<tab>
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_038<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_050<tab>It's a chancy challenge, chasing choice char in─ah, not char? Living legends! Of course I remember! Very vague venture, a vanishingly small stab at success...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_050<tab>「オオヌシ」は、おったかのう？
そもそも、噂話すらない状態ぢやからな……。
流石の流石に、今回ばかりはチミでも厳しいかもしれんなあ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_051<tab>Could it be...that the master has been mastered? That Wawalago has been wowed? The canard is correct─you have cast off your callowness to collect the catch of the day!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_051<tab>いやはや……今回釣り上げてきたお魚さんも、
「オオヌシ」の名にふさわしい、見事なものばかりぢや。
チミは、今度こそワシを超えたのかもしれんなあ……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_052<tab>Looks like <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here caught <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> a passel of living legends! Am I seeing a changing of the guard, Wawalago? Hmmm?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_052<tab>あらあら……。
どうやら本当に「オオヌシ」を釣り上げたみたいね！
ついに親分も、ギルドマスターを引退かしら？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_053<tab>Don't be so silly, Sisipu! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is an adventurer─an all-around achiever not about to confine <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> to one craft.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_053<tab>シシプちゃん、そりゃないぞい。
あくまで冒険者クンは、そっちが本業なんぢやから。
ワシはまだまだ、現役を退く気はないぞい！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_054<tab><sigh> And I was so looking forward to organizing a retirement roast in your honor... But anyway, I came by to update you on the situation you told me about.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_054<tab>はいはい。
ところで……調べてきたわよ、水揚げ量が減っている件。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_055<tab>We can rule out the currents as the cause. The cold current from the Bloodbrine Sea into the Indigo Deep is a tad fatter this year, but nothing out of the ordinary.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_055<tab>どうやら、北の緋汐海から蒼茫洋に向けて流れ込む寒流が、
このところ増加しているみたい。
でもこの辺りは、元々、寒流と暖流が混ざり合う海だし……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_056<tab>Yes, yes, the sea has its seasonal shifts. We must cast about elsewhere for the cause of the collapsing catch.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_056<tab>季節の変わり目に潮流が変わるのは、例年のこと……。
それだけが原因というわけではなさそうぢやな。
ほかにも、何か理由がありそうぢやが……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_057<tab>Ah, ahem. I am happy to report that I have solved the mystery of the plummeting fish population. That is to say, the fishery in the Rhotano Sea is doomed thanks to the Nepto Dragon.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_057<tab>皆さん、大変です！
わかったんです、水揚げ量が減った原因が！
やはり、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の仕業だったんです！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_058<tab>The absent Ascelyn arrives! Your academic acumen is always appreciated! So there be dragons in these deeps?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_058<tab>なんぢやアセリン、久しぶりに顔を出したと思ったら、
チミもこの件を調べておったのか！
しかし「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の仕業とは、どういうことぢや？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_059<tab>Ahem, Master Wawalago, you did say that the Calamity displaced fauna from their natural habitats. Well, not in so many words, but I believe we understand one another.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_059<tab>ワワラゴさんは言ってましたよね、各地の「ヌシ」は、
霊災による環境の変化が原因で現れたのかもしれないと……。
それが気になって、詳しく調べてみたんです。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_060<tab>I have verified that indeed, sightings of the Old Ones soared following the Calamity. More importantly, I have discovered that the Nepto Dragon is calamity's mistress.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_060<tab>すると、確かに過去の「ヌシ」目撃情報は全て、
霊災が起きた後から、噂に上っていたことが判明しました。
……ですがそれは、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」も同様だったんです！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_061<tab>That is to say, the creature always appears just after a natural disaster.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_061<tab>伝承にある「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の記録……
別の文献と照らし合わせると、
出現の前に、大規模な環境の変化が起きていた……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_062<tab>Historical records also spoke of slumping fish stock at the time of the Nepto Dragon's appearance.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_062<tab>そして、また別の文献によれば、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の出現とともに、
地域一帯の水揚げ量が急激に減っている……。
……そう、今回の水揚げ量の減少と、状況が類似しているのです。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_100_062<tab>So, ah, this current situation in the Rhotano Sea looks to be history repeating itself─that is to say, the fisheries here will die a painful, lingering death.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_100_062<tab>霊災後の環境の変化によって現れた、
現代の「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」によって、
近海の生態系が荒らされていることが、原因だと考えられます。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_101_062<tab>And as for <var 1A 02 /var>what<var 1A 01 /var> this creature is, ah, I believe I know that also─a sport born of little Thalaos! Or as we scholars like to say, a freak of nature.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_101_062<tab>その規模から想像するに、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の正体はおそらく、
深海に生息する、リトルサラオスの突然変異……。
……突然変異であるが故に「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」に天敵は存在しません！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_063<tab>But little Thalaos have no natural enemies, and if the Nepto Dragon is a monster version of it... We must catch the thing or these fisherfolk will starve!
target: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_063<tab>それじゃ、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣り上げないかぎり……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_064<tab>This random rogue can ruin the entire Rhotano seaboard!?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_064<tab>ラノシア近海の……。
いや、ロータノ海全体の環境が乱される……ということぢやな？

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_065<tab>That would be correct. Luckily, I've had urchins─that is to say, children, not those fascinating creatures with feet ringing their mouths─on the lookout.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_065<tab>ええ、もはや研究のためなどと言っていられません！
天敵がいないことで、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の活動は、
どんどん活発になっているようです。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_066<tab>One of them spotted the Nepto Dragon off Costa del Sol. Master Gegeruju has been kind enough to arrange a ship for a bit of dragonslaying, so to speak.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_066<tab>先ほど、コスタ・デル・ソルの沖合で、
ついに「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」らしき魚影が目撃されました。
ゲゲルジュ氏の協力で、すでに大型船を手配してもらっています！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_067<tab>Go greet your glory, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! As the finest fisher in these parts, it falls on you to finish this fearsome foe.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_067<tab>行くのぢや、冒険者クン！　チミは今や、エオルゼア最強の漁師！
ロータノ海に生きとし生ける全てのもののため、
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣り上げるのぢや！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_068<tab>Go greet your glory, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! As the finest fisherman in these parts, it falls on you to fend off this fell foe for the fishers of the Rhotano!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_068<tab>行くのぢや、冒険者クン！　チミは今や、エオルゼア最強の漁師！
ロータノ海に生きとし生ける全てのもののため、
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣り上げるのぢや！！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_069<tab>Ahem, still on the brink of disaster. The Nepto Dragon was sighted off Costa del Sol. Everything is shipshape, so to speak, for a bit of dragonslaying.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_069<tab>先ほど、コスタ・デル・ソルの沖合で、
ついに「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」らしき魚影が目撃されました。
ゲゲルジュ氏の協力で、すでに大型船を手配してもらっています！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_070<tab>Well, this has turned into quite the to<var 1F /var>do! If Master Gegeruju's involved, you'd better succeed, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Otherwise we'd never hear the end of it!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_070<tab>なんだか、ずいぶん大きな話になっちゃったわね……。
お魚さんが食べられなくなるのは困るもの。
頼んだわよ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_STEERSMAN_000_090<tab>Aye, Master Gegeruju explained─awful thorough he was about it, too. Speak with the skipper here when yer ready, and he'll take ye to the ship.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_STEERSMAN_000_090<tab>ゲゲルジュ様から話は聞いてるよ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣りにいくなら、隣の船頭に言ってくれ。
「洋上の大型船」まで連れて行ってくれるから！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_STEERSMAN_100_090<tab>Speak with the skipper here when yer ready to fish that big bastard Dragon, and he'll take ye to the ship.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_STEERSMAN_100_090<tab>ゲゲルジュ様から話は聞いてるよ！
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を釣りにいくなら、隣の船頭に言ってくれ。
「洋上の大型船」まで連れて行ってくれるから！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SENCHYO_000_120<tab>When ye catch that Nepto Dragon, give it here. We'll lay it on the deck, get a measure of its size.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SENCHYO_000_120<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」が釣れたら、俺に渡してくんな！
どんくらいのデカさなのか、甲板に横たえて測ってやろうぜ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_121<tab>The saltworn one summoned us with the shipboard 'shell. He spoke of a supreme struggle with a sea serpent! We rowed robustly to reach you, ready for any rowdiness!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_121<tab>船長からのリンクシェル連絡で、
チミが「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」と思われる大物と格闘中だと聞いてのう。
慌てて向かってきたんぢやが……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_122<tab>Terrific timing for the three of us─missed the threat but not the thrill. Why, what a whale you've whisked out of the whitecaps!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_122<tab>どうやら、間に合ったようぢやの！
チミは本当に、大した<var 08 E905 ((女)) ((男)) /var>ぢやわい！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_123<tab>Did you actually reel this monster up all by yourself? Even after all this time, you still manage to surprise me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_123<tab>この巨体を、あなたひとりで釣り上げたのね……。
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、本当にすごい！
あなたは、誰にも果たせなかった偉業を、成し遂げたのよ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_124<tab>Ah, ahem, can I get some help here? Decomposition waits for no man, and I should like to avoid any unnecessary eruptions during dissection.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_124<tab>この「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を、私の研究所まで運んでもらえますか？
すぐに解剖したいので、急ぎましょう！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_125<tab>Ahem, a great day for science. And, ah, congratulations on avoiding the destruction of an entire way of life and all that. If you'll excuse me, I must get to the laboratory.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_125<tab>私は、このまま研究所へ向かい「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を調べてみます。
突然変異の原因がわかれば、環境の保全にも繋がりますから！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_126<tab>Hm? Oh, yes, the fish stock should return to normal. Stands to reason that if nothing's eating them, they wouldn't be dead.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_ASCELYN_000_126<tab>「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」がいなくなれば、
ラノシアの水揚げ量も元に戻るはずです。
全てはあなたのおかげですね……ありがとうございます！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_127<tab>Then it's time <var 1A 02 /var>we<var 1A 01 /var> return to Fisherman's Bottom and deliver the good news to everyone!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_127<tab>私たちは、漁師ギルドに戻りましょう。
早く漁師のみんなにも伝えてあげないと！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_128<tab>Mmm... The lucent length of the late living legend fills me with fancies of flaky flesh! Surely science is not so stingy that it can't spare a succulent slice?
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_128<tab>これ……持っていっちゃうのかのう……。
ほ～んの一口でいいから、食べたいんぢやがのう……。

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_129<tab>You want to <var 1A 02 /var>eat<var 1A 01 /var> the Nepto Dragon? That is so... Wawalago, it's <var 1A 02 /var>science<var 1A 01 /var>. Ascelyn's research is far more important than your supper plans!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_129<tab>何を馬鹿なこと言ってるのよ！
親分の食欲と、ロータノ海の環境と、
どっちが大事だと思ってるの！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_130<tab>Oh, Wawalago will be fine. He's just blue because he didn't get to taste the Nepto Dragon.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_SISIPU_000_130<tab>うふふ……海の英雄さん、お疲れさま！
親分たら、「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」を食べられなかったことで、
まだ落ち込んでるのよ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_150<tab>Adventurer, we appreciate all you've accomplished here. Once more, the Rhotano shall brim with bluefins and bream, bonito and bass...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_150<tab>冒険者クン、この度はご苦労ぢやったな！
ロータノ海にも、いずれお魚さんが戻ることぢやろう。
ギルドの漁師たちも、みんなチミに感謝しておった！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_151<tab>You are an amply accomplished angler, gifted in getting at gilled gulpers. Everything in Eorzea is yours to ensnare!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_151<tab>もう今のエオルゼアには、
チミに釣り上げられない魚など、存在しないぢやろう！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_152<tab>But bear in mind, better to bide your time when the biting isn't brisk! Patience is precious, though precious few perceive it so.
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_152<tab>ただし、釣りから学ぶことはまだあるはずぢや……。
運悪く釣れない日があったとしても、気にするでないぞい？
お魚さんが、ゆっくり考える時間をくれたと思えばいいのぢや！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_153<tab>Philosophical followings are not my forte! But few can beat me in braising, boiling, and browbeating! Ascelyn sneaked me some scrumptious steaks sawed off the Nepto Dragon!
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_153<tab>さて、めでたしめでたし、ということで……。
……実は、シシプちゃんに内緒で、アセリンから、
「<var 28 ((Item)) ((　8754)) 01 /var>」の切り身を少しもらってきたんぢやよ！

source: TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_154<tab>No speaking to Sisipu of this─she's blinded by science! Now, decisions, decisions! Browned in butter? Capers? Cream and cumin? Or patted in pepper and put in a pie...
target:
TEXT_SUBSEA923_00246_WAWALAGO_000_154<tab>さあ、シシプちゃんに気づかれる前に、酒の用意ぢや！
刺し身がいいかのう……いや、軽く炙って……。
むほ～、ヨダレが止まらんぞい！
